channel.title: Help on 1 error
channel.description:
I was using Ian's destroy item interface tut and I got this error
[code]client.java:21150: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Destroiitam location: class client Destroiitam = droppedItem; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
What do I do o.O. Destroyitem is spelled wrong but If I change it to Destroyitem, it still does nothing but same error just spelled correctly

item.title: Help on 1 error
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

Demi Sphere:

Explain more in detail next time dumbass…

More detail rofl? It’s an error, how can I explain it more? I said HOW CAN I FIX THIS ERROR. Dumbass

client.java:21150: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Destroiitam location: class client Destroiitam = droppedItem; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Help on 1 error
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

[quote=“Demi Sphere, post:2, topic:187465”]Ian can’t code worth shit, let me get it. Brb.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2008, 03:16:29 PM[/size][hr]Here is mine.

[code]public void dropItem(int droppedItem, int slot) {
boolean a = true;
if (a && (playerRights == 0)) {
sendMessage(“Dropping has been disabled”);
sendMessage(“Use ::empty to delete your inventory instead”);
return;
}

[/code][/quote]

Seriously? Your last post on npc dialogues was useless and this one is too. I’m asking on how to fix my error not get that piece of shit. I have a dropitem but I replaced it with Ian’s

You can’t code worth of shit

case 87: // drop item int droppedItem = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); somejunk = inStream.readUnsignedByte()+inStream.readUnsignedByte(); int slot = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); //println_debug("dropItem: "+droppedItem+" Slot: "+slot); if(isUntradable(droppedItem)) { sendMessage("You drop the "+getItemName(droppedItem)+", it vanishes into the ground."); deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]); } if(droppedItem == 744 && absX == 2780 && absY == 3515 && q3stage == 5) { server.npcHandler.newNPC(1645, absX+1, absY, heightLevel, absX + 3, absY + 3, absX + -3, absY + -3, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(1645), false); } else if(wearing == false && playerItems[slot] == droppedItem+1){ dropItem(droppedItem, slot); } break;

Read full topic
